name: Carbogen Amcis - Cholesterol NF
description: Carbogen Amcis supplies pharmaceutical-grade Cholesterol NF for cosmetic and pharmaceutical applications. Cholesterol serves as an excellent emulsifying agent and moisturizer in skin conditioning cosmetics. Their cGMP-certified cholesterol ensures the highest quality standards for barrier repair formulations. Multiple grades available including Cholesterol HP (High Purity) for liposomal formulations.
specializations.description: Carbogen Amcis offers Cholesterol NF grade meeting United States Pharmacopeia (USP) and National Formulary (NF) standards. This pharmaceutical-grade cholesterol serves as an excellent emulsifying agent and moisturizer in cosmetic and pharmaceutical preparations. Manufactured under cGMP certification for pharmaceutical-grade quality. Also offers Cholesterol HP (High Purity) for liposomal formulations.
specializations.notes: cGMP certification ensures pharmaceutical-grade quality. High-purity cholesterol (Cholesterol HP) is specifically designed for liposomal formulations. Multiple grades available for pharma, cosmetic, and nutritional applications. Excellent choice for premium barrier repair formulations requiring highest quality standards.
notes: Pharmaceutical-grade cholesterol with cGMP certification ensures highest quality standards. Multiple grades available for different applications (pharma, cosmetic, nutritional). High Purity grade optimized for liposomal drug delivery and advanced cosmetic formulations.
description: Carbogen Amcis is a Swiss pharmaceutical and cosmetic ingredient supplier offering pharmaceutical-grade Cholesterol NF with cGMP certification. Their cholesterol serves as an excellent emulsifying agent in cosmetic preparations and powerful moisturizer in skin conditioning cosmetics, available in multiple grades for pharmaceutical, cosmetic, and nutritional applications.
products: Cholesterol HP (High Purity for liposomal formulations)
notes: Swiss pharmaceutical-grade supplier with cGMP certification. Offers multiple cholesterol grades including standard Cholesterol NF and high-purity Cholesterol HP specifically designed for liposomal formulations. Excellent choice for premium barrier repair formulations requiring pharmaceutical-grade quality.
